base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with a modern design.
part_description: Features three upper compartments, one large lower door, and a flat top. Compartments are evenly spaced and rectangular. The lower door spans the width of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The upper compartments provide separate storage spaces, allowing for organized placement of items. The lower door opens to reveal a larger storage area, which can accommodate bulkier items. The flat top can be utilized for additional storage or display purposes.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall for stability and space efficiency. It interacts with users by providing accessible storage solutions. The compartments and door are designed for easy opening and closing, facilitating convenient access to stored items.
